text: Georges Trombert (10 August 1874 - 27 February 1949) was a French fencer. He won two silver medals and a bronze at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1874 births Category:1949 deaths Category:French male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Sportspeople from Geneva Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics
title: Georges Trombert
